items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.
items.title: AnkanSaha/AxioDB: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.

items.content_html: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
items.title: otaku0304/Internationalization: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications.  The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
